name: filegator
description: FileGator is a multi-user, web-based file manager for self-hosted servers. It includes drag-and-drop uploads, folder permissions, and responsive UI, making it suitable for internal file sharing or shared storage access.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user web file manager, Drag-and-drop uploads, Folder permissions. Shared storage access simplified

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Works on desktop and mobile. Access anywhere

features.title: User Management
features.description: Multiple accounts and roles. Team collaboration

features.title: File Previews
features.description: View documents and images. Quick inspection

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find files across directories. Efficient discovery

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Edit files in browser. Quick modifications
